task.summary: Default task
Added Hausdorff distance metric
Scale Hausdorff distance to mm. Add mirror_warp shell scripts.
First pass tidy up for general release. Remove historical artifacts, broken scripts, etc.
First pass tidy up for general release. Remove historical artifacts, broken scripts, etc.
Correct extensions for all scripts.
Correct extensions for all scripts.
Organize all scripts into directories.
Organize all scripts into directories.
Flatten directories - that wasn't as convenient as I thought.
Flatten directories - that wasn't as convenient as I thought.
Add lesion atlas analysis.
Added prob2cifti.sh for converting probabilistic atlases to CIFTI dlabel format. Renamed prob2idx.sh to prob2det.sh for consistency.
Add atlas label reporting
Separate label metrics and label report
Switch to jinja2 for HTML report templating
Add observer report pages
Rationalizing intra and inter-observer reports
Adding tryptics of prob labels
Adding tryptics of prob labels
Move label key processing to atlas_report.py
Redo metrics array and list structures in atlas_report.py
Skeleton version of intra and inter reports
Skeleton version of intra and inter reports
Working summary, intra and inter reports. Need to complete summary of similarity metrics by observer and label
First release v1.0.0
Set jinja search path to atlas_report.py script directory (sys.path[0])
Remove unused subdirectories
Limit Hausdorff distance calculation to surface voxels of masks only - improves efficiency and speed. Surface voxels identified by erosion difference.
Fixed central slice extraction from projections. Clipped ROIs caused tryptic failures.
Updated usage for prob2det.sh
Add support for Allen Brain Atlas download (SVG and JPG), creating prob atlas montages.

Rewrite lesion_atlas_analysis.py (renamed to atlas_lesion_analysis.py). Now using Bokeh for HTML reporting. Fixed normalization of lesion-atlas intersection volumes - previously normalized to total bilateral volume of atlas label, not unilateral volume.

Rewrite lesion_atlas_analysis.py (renamed to atlas_lesion_analysis.py). Now using Bokeh for HTML reporting. Fixed normalization of lesion-atlas intersection volumes - previously normalized to total bilateral volume of atlas label, not unilateral volume.

First release v1.0.0
Set jinja search path to atlas_report.py script directory (sys.path[0])
Remove unused subdirectories
Limit Hausdorff distance calculation to surface voxels of masks only - improves efficiency and speed. Surface voxels identified by erosion difference.
Fixed central slice extraction from projections. Clipped ROIs caused tryptic failures.
Updated usage for prob2det.sh
Add support for Allen Brain Atlas download (SVG and JPG), creating prob atlas montages.

Rewrite lesion_atlas_analysis.py (renamed to atlas_lesion_analysis.py). Now using Bokeh for HTML reporting. Fixed normalization of lesion-atlas intersection volumes - previously normalized to total bilateral volume of atlas label, not unilateral volume.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Rewrite lesion_atlas_analysis.py (renamed to atlas_lesion_analysis.py). Now using Bokeh for HTML reporting. Fixed normalization of lesion-atlas intersection volumes - previously normalized to total bilateral volume of atlas label, not unilateral volume.
